channel.title: Whats going on?
channel.description: I added a paladin to my server it works yea...but i added a iron metal dragon and bronze if you try to hit it teles you to yannile how to fix?

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @hellsing604 hellsing604
item.description:
@hellsing604 wrote:

how do i make it were if a monster kills you lose items oh and this is what i did to…the client for NPC coords is this right? i took out coords and put this in } else if (NPCID == 1699) {
// Text
2567,3098 = true;
WanneShop = 40; // Ghost Shopkeeper[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2008, 08:53:39 AM[/size][hr][quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:174093"]It’s like that because, there used to be other objects there, so it takes about 10seconds for them to appear.

You need blue key (1546) to attack them. and to delete it from needing the key, Search for 1546 in client.java

You’ll see something like this:

if ((type == 1856) || (type == 1590)) { if (!playerHasItem(1546)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if ((type == 1591) || (type == 1592)) { if (!playerHasItem(1546)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Delete it. But you should keep it, because it stops people from no cliping from Yanille dungeon there, and attacking them.[/quote]
Btw when u ment delet it did u mean by delete all of this? }
if ((type == 1856) || (type == 1590)) {
if (!playerHasItem()) {
resetPos();
ResetAttackNPC();
return false;
}
}
if ((type == 1591) || (type == 1592)) {
if (!playerHasItem()) {
resetPos();
ResetAttackNPC();
return false;
}
oh…and how do i make the pots in the shops work?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @hellsing604 hellsing604
item.description:
@hellsing604 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:6, topic:174093"]In client.java, search this:

} else if (NPCID == 932) { // Legends General Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 38; // Legend's Gen. Store

Under it add:

} else if (NPCID == npcid) { // Text PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Ghost shopkeeper

Then in shops.cfg, add this:

shop = 43	Shop_Name					2	2	itemid	amount

Change the item ids, amount, and Shop_Name, but leave the first 2s.[/quote]
instead of making a new shop i edited a shop and made it ghost is that ok? i erased white herb shop and put a name then for shop id i put in ghost shopkeeper id[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2008, 08:18:40 AM[/size][hr]nvm what i did dididn’t work srry for double post

Read full topic

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In client.java, search this:

} else if (NPCID == 932) { // Legends General Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 38; // Legend's Gen. Store

Under it add:

} else if (NPCID == npcid) { // Text PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; // Ghost shopkeeper

Then in shops.cfg, add this:

shop = 43	Shop_Name					2	2	itemid	amount

Change the item ids, amount, and Shop_Name, but leave the first 2s.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It’s like that because, there used to be other objects there, so it takes about 10seconds for them to appear.

You need blue key (1546) to attack them. and to delete it from needing the key, Search for 1546 in client.java

You’ll see something like this:

if ((type == 1856) || (type == 1590)) { if (!playerHasItem(1546)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } } if ((type == 1591) || (type == 1592)) { if (!playerHasItem(1546)) { resetPos(); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Delete it. But you should keep it, because it stops people from no cliping from Yanille dungeon there, and attacking them.

Read full topic

it won’t let me trade him if i trade him nothing happens and can i put it were i don’t have to use keys
and im using ur source…and sometimes if i login you know the red portal to barrows and that big gate?
i can’t see it idk why

item.title: Whats going on?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
